name: Gorgon's Loving Smooching
outcome: {AttackerName} places her hands on {TargetName}'s cheeks and smooches {TargetHisOrHer} face, humming contently as she covers {TargetHimOrHer} with black lipstick marks!
miss: {AttackerName} places her hands on {TargetName}'s cheeks and attempts to smooch {TargetHisOrHer} face, but {TargetName} squirms out of her lips' way!
statusOutcome: {TargetName} becomes enamored by {AttackerName}'s loving advances... {TargetName} is charmed!
